author: ETA PRIME
description:
n this video, we take a hands-on look at the Chizha Mount Ling Dock — a brand-new touchscreen dock built specifically for handheld gaming PCs like the Steam Deck and Legion Go 2!
This dock goes way beyond the usual USB-C hubs — it’s got a built-in touch display, tons of connectivity options, and a premium design that looks straight out of a sci-fi movie. I test it with the Steam Deck OLED and the Lenovo Legion Go 2, checking display output, charging, external storage speeds, and how that built-in screen actually performs in real use.
If you’ve been looking for the ultimate dock for your handheld setup, the Chizha Mount Ling might just be it.
🧩 Key Highlights
Built-in touch screen for stats and controls
USB4 / HDMI / Ethernet / SD Card expansion
Works with Steam Deck, Legion Go 2, and more

learn more here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/dockcaseexplorerepro/chizha-mount-ling-dock-where-legends-ascend

title: This Next-Gen Handheld Docking Station Has a Built In Touchscreen!
